* Meet the City Council


Plainfield City Council
=======================

The Plainfield City Council is the governing/legislative body of the City. Composed of seven elected officials, the primary purpose is to enact municipal laws via ordinances and resolutions.
Except for Executive Session, all meetings are open to the public.

**2024 Plainfield City Council**

**![Steve-G-Hockaday](https://www.plainfieldnj.gov/revize_photo_gallery/Government/Elected%20officials/Plainfield%20City%20Council/Members/Steve-G-Hockaday.jpg)
Council President & Councilman-At-Large
*Steve G. Hockaday (D)***
317 Monroe Avenue
908-872-0553
**Email:**
[Steve.hockaday@plainfieldnj.gov](mailto:Steve.hockaday@plainfieldnj.gov)
Information Technology Committee (CHAIR), Economic Development Committee (CHAIR), Finance Committee, Senior Citizens Center Committee (ALT), Mayors Citizens Advisory Board
****Elected 11-03-20, General Election 4-Year Term Ending 12-31-2024
![graham1](https://www.plainfieldnj.gov/graham1.jpg)
